subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The Czech Republic completed a 3-0 victory over the United States as Frantisek Cermak and Radek Stepanek defeated Andy Roddick and Ryan Harrison in the doubles at the Team World Cup.
snippet: The Czech Republic completed a 3-0 victory over the United States as Frantisek Cermak and Radek Stepanek defeated Andy Roddick and Ryan Harrison in the doubles at the Team World Cup.
